text: @realDonaldTrump As @NYGovCuomo eloquently said, @realDonaldTrump just wants to lead the parade. #Trump is a lazy, self-serving blowhard with bone spurs. He likes to see his name on the millions of checks yet to be received but he won't do the hard work of testing to save lives. #coronavirus
